than double gyroids. Its free energy is slightly greater than that of P6/mm cylinders and that of Lamellae. It is followed by Metatronâ€™s cube with Pn3m symmetry in its unit cell of

, where its free energy is almost the same as that of conventional BCC Im3m spheres in an almost identical unit cell. BCC spheres are followed by double diamonds with Pn3m symmetry. The optimized free energies of the remaining morphologies lie in between those of double diamonds and disorder.
